column1: # Title: H2A energy input-output coefficients of hydrogen production technologies
# Units: Generally GJ in /kg H2 out unless otherwise indicated
# Source: H2A is the DOE EERE Hydrogen program's analysis model (https://www.hydrogen.energy.gov/h2a_analysis.html). H2A 2018 (generally)
column2: Results tab (2008 for nuclear thermal splitting).

column1: # Comments: Non-energy cost = required selling price - feedstock costs. Max improvement = improvement_to_2040 + 10% unless otherwise stated
